![](https://www.yourlasthost.com/img/India-vps.jpg)

**[YourLastHost ](https://www.yourlasthost.com/)(established 2016)** has recently expanded beyond its three distinct locations of Los Angeles, Jacksonville, and France to begin offering **[VPS hosting services in Pune, India](https://www.yourlasthost.com/india-vps.php)**. Our India VPS are based on OpenVZ and come with a 99.99% uptime guarantee, a 90-day money back guarantee, and the full support of our staff, who are available 24x7 on live chat and tickets.

**U-512**

- 1 Core
- 512 MB Memory
- 20 GB Storage
- 1000 GB Bandwidth
- 1 IPv4 Address
- $3.40/m for life – coupon code “LETINDIA”
- **[ORDER NOW](https://clients.yourlasthost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=20&promocode=LETINDIA&configoption%5b2%5d=106)**

**U-1024**

- 1 Core
- 1024 MB Memory
- 30 GB Storage
- 2000 GB Bandwidth
- 1 IPv4 Address
- $5.10/m for life – coupon code “LETINDIA”
- **[ORDER NOW](https://clients.yourlasthost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=21&promocode=LETINDIA&configoption%5b2%5d=106)**

More India VPS Hosting Plans are **[HERE](https://www.yourlasthost.com/india-vps.php)**

Our datacenter is based in Pune, India, and the following test IPv4 address is available:
103.250.185.118

We are happy to answer any questions you have for us. Feel free to contact us at sales@yourlasthost.com or reply to the thread. We look forward to earning your business.

**Customer reviews & testimonials**
